mapper.select: SELECT u.id as uid, u.username as username, u.password as password, u.enabled as enabled, r.id as rid, r.name as rname, r.descn as rdescn, g.id as gid, g.name as gname, g.descn as gdescn FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_role uo ON u.id = uo.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON r.id = uo.role_id LEFT JOIN group_user gu ON gu.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN groups g ON g.id = gu.group_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
SELECT id,username,enabled FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, username, password, enabled) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{enabled})
